content: elevate your style with this cozy elegance chunky cowl a modern and quick-to-crochet accessory designed just for you this chic and comfortable cowl effortlessly combines fashion and practicality providing a touch of luxury in a simple time-efficient pattern this listing is for digital patterns only do not expect a physical product this pattern is written in standard us terms to ensure easy-to-read and follow directions plus accuracy all my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers and tech-edited be the first to know about new pattern releases sales and giveaways subscribe to my email list the pdf is designed for printing this way you can support my small business **skill level** easy **finished measurements** 14 long x 17 wide flat
